content: HUD-L Extra-long plastic wall plug Economical, elongated plastic wall plugs for fastening to thicker plaster and double-layer drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Extra-long plastic wall plug – suitable for bridging thick layers of plaster up to 30 mm Suitable for hollow walls – forms a knot when set in hollow materials and double-clad drywall panels More reliable installation – Hilti HUD-L wall plugs are engineered to guide the screw with no breaking through or wandering out of the anchor body Easier to set – four-way tip expansion designed to minimize rotation and hold securely in the hole Takes industry-standard screws – you can use commercially available screws with these plastic anchors (sold separately, see technical data sheet for required screw size) Applications Refurbishment work on thick layers of plaster and on double-clad drywall panels – e.g. battens, junction boxes, cables, light switches, lights, brackets, signs, shelves, plumbing fixtures, wall brackets etc. Extra-long plastic anchor for refurbishment and renovation work or drywall installation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (uncracked), Drywall, Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) Head configuration: N/A Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | N/A | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Plastic ### ITEMS- 315938 - Univ pl anchor HUD-L 1/4 x 2 - Package Size 400 pc Package Contents: - 1x HUD-L 6X50 Anchor
tag_description: Economical, elongated plastic wall plugs for fastening to thicker plaster and double-layer drywall
